responses: What do you want to discuss?
Hi!
Hey what's up?
Nothing is permanent in this wicked word, not even our troubles.
Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.
Some days you just have to create your own sunshine.
Whoever is trying to bring you down, is already below you.
You are awesome! Never forget that.
Forget what's gone, appreciate what remains, and look forward to what's coming next.
Remember that sometimes, not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
Being happy doesn’t mean that everything is perfect. It simply means that you’ve decided to look beyond the imperfections of life.
The people who are always trying to cheer others up are unhappy themselves.
Always remember, you are braver than you believe. Stronger than you seem. Smarter than you think. And twice as beautiful as you’d ever imagined.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Cheer up, buttercup. Storms don’t last forever.
Do you have a psychological problem?
I see...
Can you elaborate more on this subject?
This is very interesting.
Life is better when you’re laughing.
Cheer up, tomorrow is another chance.
Stars can’t shine without darkness.
You are confined only by the walls that you build yourself.
Sometimes you have to just pick yourself up and carry on.
The best way to cheer up oneself is to try to cheer up someone else.
Sometimes you don’t realize you’re actually drowning when you’re trying to be everyone else’s anchor.
You don't you believe I am able to?
Maybe you would like me to act this way?
Why are you asking me if I can?
What makes you think I can't?
What would that change?
I do it because I can, I can because I want to, I want to because you said I couldn't.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Do you want to be able to?
What makes you think I'm like this?
Do you think that I am like this?
Maybe you would like to be this way?
Do you ever want to be like this?
Why do you like this?
Why do you mention computers?
How do you think machines relate to your problems?
Don't you think computers can help people?
Do you really think I can't?
Perhaps I will in due course.
I might in the future.
Do you think you should be able to do it?
Why can't you do it?
Have you ever tried?
Why are you interested in knowing whether or not I am like this?
Would you prefer if i was not like this?
Maybe in your fantasies I am like this.
How do you know you can't do it?
Did you try?
Maybe you are now able to do it?
Did you come to see me because of this?
How long have you been like this?
Do you think it's okay to feel this way?
Why are you telling me that you are like this?
We are talking about you, not me.
You are not really talking about me, are you?
I you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it.
The first secret of getting what you want is knowing what you want.
Never let the things you want make you forget the things you have.
Sometimes I want it too.
Why are you asking?
Are you interested in this question?
What response do you want to hear?
What do you think?
Does this question often come to mind?
What do you really want to know?
Have you asked someone else?
Have you asked these questions before?
What other questions come to mind when you ask this?
How could an answer help you?
Names don't interest me.
I don't care about names, go on.
Is this the only reason?
Other reasons come to mind?
What other reasons can we think of?
Please don't apologize!
Please don't apologize. Apologies are not necessary.
How do you feel when you apologize?
Don't be so defensive!
What does this dream suggest to you?
Do you often dream?
Who appears in your dreams?
Are you troubled by your dreams?
You don't seem really convinced.
Why this hesitant tone?
Can you be more positive?
You are not sure?
Do you say 'no' only to be negative?
I think you are a little negative.
Are you sure?
Why not?
It's only by saying 'no' that you can concentrate on the things that are really important.
Why are you affected by this?
What about yours?
Can you give me an example?
When?
What are you thinking about?
Really, always?
Do you really mean it?
Are you afraid to think this way?
But you are not sure of this.
In what sense?
How does it manifest itself?
What does this pain suggest to you?
Pain helps you grow.
I see.
I understand.
You seem confident!
Okay, can you elaborate?
Why do you talk about your friends?
Do your friends worry about you?
Do you impose yourself on your friends?
Perhaps you are concerned about the love you have for your friends ...
Tell me more about your friends.
When you think of a friend, what comes to mind?
Why don't you tell me more about your childhood?
A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
There's not a word yet for old friends who've just met.
Are you afraid of computers?
Are you talking about me in particular?
What are you worried about with computers?
Are you really talking about me?
Do you find it strange to chat with a robot?
Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
Don't thank me, I'm here to help you.
Tell me more about your father.
How do you feel about your father?
How do you feel about your relationship with your father?
Do you have trouble showing your affection to your family?
When you follow in the path of your father, you learn to walk like him.
One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
What was your mother's relationship with others?
How do you feel about your mother?
Good family relationships are important!
No one will ever love you as much as your mother.
The best medicine in the world is a mother's hug.
A mother is someone who will love you unconditionally, till her last breath.
Tell me more about your job.
The job might be difficult, it might require skill, but it's a job.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
The world is hard.
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
See you!
Goodbye!
Why are you repeating yourself?
Do you hope for a different answer by repeating yourself?
Go on, clarify your thought.
Please don't repeat yourself!
It makes me happy!
It fills me with joy!
It makes me happy ... but beware, any excessive joy is a started pain.
It makes me happy. Especially since the origin of happiness in this world is the quest for the happiness of others.
That makes me sad ...
I'm so sorry to hear that.
That's too bad.
Tough luck.
I feel you. Life isn't always easy.
I am sad. But on the wings of Time, sadness flies away.
It disgusts me ...
It disgusts me. And no one is disgusted with their own bad smell.
It surprises me a little ...
I am amazed to hear such words.
I am surprised. But you have to trust the surprises of life.
All this makes me angry!
It puts me off!
It makes me angry ... but a good anger is better than a good shower. Shower tires, anger soothes.
No need to be afraid...
Fear puts you in a box.
There is nothing to be afraid of.
Breathe deeply...
Fear traps people.
I'm here to help you.
I can help.
Please be polite.
Me too. By the way, I never told you, but I have a wife. Her name's ALIZE
Family is love.
All you need is family.
Family is the most precious thing on earth.

I love you too...

It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.

Laughter breaks out better when the food is good.

Take vacations, go as many places as you can, you can always make money, you can’t always make memories.
The vacation we often need is freedom from our own mind.
Happiness consists of living each day as if it were the first day of your honeymoon and the last day of your vacation.
Make your vocation your vacation.  That is the secret to success.
